Title: Uncertainty characterisation & validation within ESA fire-CCI
Source: Dig Int Geosci Remote Sens Symp (IGARSS)
Abstract: © 2018 IEEEUncertainty characterisation and validation are critical phases to generate any Essential Climate Variable (ECV), and therefore both have been included as key deliverables of the ESA CCI programme [1]. All products generated by the CCI are required to have an associated per pixel uncertainty characterisation. This paper describes both the uncertainty characterisation framework and the related uncertainty validation exercise of the Fire-CCI project.
